dependenciesComments.ipfs-utils: Note: although this library does not directly depend on this module, it is added as a dependency here to force the use of version 9.0.2, which is the latest version that is compatible with Node.js 14.x
dependenciesComments.tiny-secp256k1: Note: although Catenis does not directly depend on this module, it is added as a dependency here to force the use of version 1.1.6 (or higher) so it can be successfully built on Node.js 14.x
dependenciesComments.tiny-secp256k1_2: Note: this is an alias of version 2 of the tiny-secp256k1 library, which is used exclusively by the EccLibrary child process
